content.p: For each artery, indicate if it is named for the region it is in, or the bone it would follow.

response.feedback: Incorrect. There is no axillary bone.
Correct. The axilla is the armpit.

part.hint: Some arteries are named for regions because there are no bones that are strictly contained in a region. Others are named for the bones they follow because a single region might contain multiple bones and arteries.

response.feedback: Correct. The radial artery runs along the radius bone.
Incorrect. This artery is in the antebrachial region.
